servicesShowcase.heading: Handle every trademark need sooner
servicesShowcase.description: From filing and renewal to opposition letters, each service is designed to keep the process lean and secure.

tabs.title: Trademark Filing
tabs.description: Full assistance that covers clearance research, Nice class selection, document preparation, official DJKI submission, and status monitoring.

tabs.title: Trademark Renewal
tabs.description: Renew on time with data validation, formal submission, and deadline reminders so your protection extends for another ten years.

tabs.title: Opposition Letter
tabs.description: Develop a strong legal basis to challenge imitators. The structure is methodical, swift, and laser focused.

featuresGrid.heading: A complete suite for filing, renewal, and trademark protection
featuresGrid.description: Every workflow is handled by experienced consultants with tidy forms and rapid responses.

finalCta.heading: Protect your trademark today
finalCta.subheading: Do not wait until someone else uses your name.
finalCta.body: We manage trademark filing and renewal at DJKI, from clearance and submission through to certificate issuance. We also cover opposition letters, office action responses, data changes, assignments, licences, and certificate printing.
finalCta.note: Official DJKI partner. Transparent flat pricing. Regular progress updates.
finalCta.imageAlt: UrusMerek.id dashboard for managing trademark filing and renewal.

brand.description: Your trusted partner for trademark filing, renewal, and protection in Indonesia.

licenses.title: Licences and References

items.name: Ministry of Law and Human Rights (DJKI)

licenses.disclaimer: Government logos are shown as references to the official trademark authority. UrusMerek.id operates as an independent consultant.

aiFeatures.title: Smart tools to manage your trademark faster
aiFeatures.description: Check name availability, prepare documents, and monitor filings with dedicated consultants.

items.title: AI checks trademark availability and similarity
items.body: Receive instant search results complete with similarity insights. A concise report guides conversations with our consultants so every filing decision feels secure.

image.alt: AI interface for trademark similarity review

items.title: Automated paperwork and intelligent search
items.body: Structure every filing document with guided templates, avoid input mistakes, and locate supporting data intelligently. Our consultants finalize each dossier and submit it formally.

items.title: Next day service and extended protection
items.body: Once documents are ready your application moves forward on the next business day. Ongoing support covers ten year renewals, refusal responses, ownership transfers, and licensing agreements tailored to your needs.

cta.title: Do not wait until someone else claims your brand
cta.description: Protect your identity with the support of UrusMerek.id consultants.

problem.title: Trademark filing feels complicated
problem.description: Too many tools, confusing forms, and legal jargon slow everything down. Time is wasted and mistakes become more likely.

solution.title: We make it simple
solution.description: UrusMerek.id unifies search, filing, status tracking, renewals, and objection letters in one organised workflow.

flexibility.heading: Everything your team needs
flexibility.description: Our flexible platform adapts to every trademark scenario and keeps evolving to deliver better service.

cards.title: Multiple service views
cards.description: Switch between list, board, timeline, and more to manage every engagement with ease.

image.alt: Visual display of different service views

cards.title: Packages you can tailor
cards.description: Toggle the services your client needs and launch the right assistance instantly.

pricingSelector.title: Choose the service you need
pricingSelector.description: Select any option below to reveal the service details, benefits, and fees.

selector.title: Choose a service
selector.description: Tap an option to show the highlights.

button.label: Chat with us
button.aria: Chat with our consultants on WhatsApp

panel.optionLabel: Pick an option to see the price
panel.note: Fees already include our handling service. Some items may require official government charges.

dashboard.title: Operational Summary

todo.title: Next Actions
items: Review new consultations and assign to the legal team.
Verify withdraw requests before their due dates.
Update partner commissions that need adjustment.

partners.title: Partner Directory
partners.description: Monitor each partner's performance and manage their commission details.

consultations.title: Consultation Requests
consultations.description: Review and follow up on the latest consultation requests from prospects.
consultations.empty: No consultations match the current filters.

withdraw.title: Withdraw Requests
withdraw.description: Approve and monitor partner commission payouts.
withdraw.empty: No withdraw requests for the current filters.

features.title: Upcoming Features
features.description: A space for future admin tools like content management and advanced reporting.
items: Integrate payment tracking with proof uploads.

commissionSettings.title: Default Commission Settings
commissionSettings.description: Set the base commission applied to all partners unless they have custom rules.
notes: The default rate is used when a partner has no custom configuration.
Custom settings can be updated on the partner detail page.

defaultCommission.label: Default Commission (%)
defaultCommission.help: This rate is applied to every new partner. Example: fill 12 for 12%.
defaultCommission.invalid: Commission percentage must be greater than 0

layout.headerDescription: Manage your commissions and referral performance.

dashboard.title: Partner Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track link performance, the latest referrals, and commissions ready to withdraw.

performance.title: Referral Performance
performance.description: Monitor click and referral trends in the last 7 and 30 days.

ready.title: Commission ready to withdraw!
ready.description: You still have approved commission that hasn't been requested. Open the withdraw tab to submit a payout.

links.title: Referral Links
links.description: Update link status and monitor clicks alongside commission performance.

referrals.title: Referral History
referrals.description: Review referral history and their payout status.

noWithdraw.title: No commission ready to withdraw
noWithdraw.description: Commission will appear here after your referrals are approved. Keep an eye on link performance in the dashboard.

createLink.title: Create a New Referral Link
createLink.description: Set the destination URL and short notes so everything is easy to recognise.
createLink.error: Failed to create link. Please provide a valid URL.

affTable.copyError: Automatic copy failed. Please copy manually.
affTable.editDescription: Update the destination URL or internal notes for this link.
affTable.descriptionPlaceholder: Short info to differentiate the link
affTable.descriptionHelp: Notes are internal only and limited to 160 characters.
affTable.deleteDescription: Link {code} can no longer be used once deleted. This action cannot be undone.

withdraw.title: Commission Withdraw
withdraw.description: Request commission payouts and monitor their status in real time.

emptyAlert.title: No commission ready to withdraw
emptyAlert.description: Commission will appear here once your referrals are approved. Keep monitoring link performance in the dashboard.

history.title: Request History
history.description: Status is updated by the finance team. Notes will appear if further action is needed.

withdrawDialog.title: Submit Withdraw Request
withdrawDialog.setDefault: Set as default bank for next withdraw

profile.title: Partner Profile
profile.description: Update your contact information and choose the primary bank account for payouts.
profile.bankHelp: The default account will be used automatically for new withdraw requests.
